spiritsExplanation:
The workout titled "Bodyweight Strength" focuses on increasing heart rate and building strength, which suggests elements of a "High-Energy & Intense" spirit. This is supported by the use of lively music genres like Hip Hop/R&B and Global Hits, which typically accompany high-energy sessions, justifying a score of 0.7.

The setting on a dock overlooking water and cityscape provides an "Outdoor & Adventure" spirit. The workout is performed in an outdoor environment, even though it is mat-based, warranting a score of 0.6 due to the natural and adventurous backdrop.

The categorization as "On The Mat" and "strength" suggests some degree of planned exercise structure, meriting a "Structured & Disciplined" spirit with a score of 0.5. The workout likely follows a systematic approach with rounds, indicating discipline and consistency. Other spirits like "Soothing & Restorative" and "Flow & Rhythm" were less apparent due to the focus on strength and intensity.
